andromeda.why: Withdraws from pressure to preserve narrative sovereignty.

arcturus.why: Sets a privacy container—right place and pace for retreat.

draco.why: Secrecy can read as gatekeeping or ranky access.

lyra.why: This phase is silence/reflection, not display.

orion-dark.why: Retreat may harden into rules of silence as control.

orion-light.why: Courage to step back rather than perform on demand.

pleiades.why: Calming boundaries soothe nervous systems after exposure.

andromeda.why: Protects the right to withhold until it is safe to speak.

arcturus.why: Frames confidentiality and timing—clean placement of voice.

draco.why: Loyal guard of private material and access thresholds.

lyra.why: Simple, graceful phrasing when sharing resumes.

orion-dark.why: House-language risk replacing truth with protocol optics.

orion-light.why: Discipline to wait for the right audience and moment.

andromeda.why: Outsourcing agency via gossip/leaks or coerced confession.

draco.why: Secret-keeping as clique power or intimidation.

lyra.why: Performance of story eclipses its integrity.

orion-light.why: Ordeal teaches honest retreat and right sharing.

pleiades.why: Appeasement disclosures to keep peace distort truth.

andromeda.why: Liberates by choosing what to retire and what to tell.

arcturus.why: Designs the debrief container—who, when, and how much.

draco.why: Keeps oaths; manages ranked access to sensitive history.

lyra.why: Crafted narrative helps the lesson land without spectacle.

orion-dark.why: Debrief format can ossify into dogma.

orion-light.why: Integrity in translating experience into lesson.

pleiades.why: Soothing tone reduces reactivity around disclosure.

sirius.why: Teaches disclosure protocol by example—timed, scoped release.

andromeda.why: Uses authority to free the record from oppressive spin.

arcturus.why: Sets standards for archives, embargoes, and release cadence.

draco.why: Enforces loyalty to confidentiality and fair access.

orion-light.why: Holds integrity under pressure to reveal or conceal.

pleiades.why: Mentoring tone helps communities integrate the past.

sirius.why: Instruction in memory law—what is kept, who sees, and when.

andromeda.why: Embodied retreat preserves freedom from public capture.

arcturus.why: Establishes enduring norms for withdrawal and selective voice.

draco.why: Aura can feel like a gate to the ‘real story.’

lyra.why: Archetypal storyteller—few words carry cultural weight.

orion-dark.why: Canonized secrecy risks law-over-life and censorship.

orion-light.why: Role-model courage to speak or stay silent by truth.

sirius.why: Royal instruction: canon of privacy/disclosure transmitted by presence.
